ol.li: After the reading of the Gospel, the Gospel is wrapped in a white silk veil. The priest carries it on his arms (as Simon the Elder carried Christ in his arms on this day).
The deacons carry candles and the priests carry the censers and they go around the Altar three times only while chanting the hymn "Galilee of the Gentiles (]Galilea~)" in its great tune:

Comment.Language: At the end of the circuit, the priest carrying the Gospel stands at the gateway of the Sanctuary facing the west, and everyone approaches, makes a prostration, and kisses the Gospel.
